title.value: Methods of definition of supplying vegetable crops by nutrients
Методы определения обеспеченности овощных культур элементами питания

journal.title: Soil Science and Agrochemistry : scientific journal

person.name: Semenenko, N.N., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Land Reclamation
Zhabrovskaya, N.Yu., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Soil Science and Agrochemistry
Vorobeva, T.A., The Ministry of Agriculture and Food of the Republic of Belarus, Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there was developed the rapid methods for determining the nutrient sufficiency of vegetables. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus on experimental field of the Institute for Soil Science and Agrochemistry (Minsk region) on sod-podzolic light loamy soil. As a result of realized research there were revealed the methods of definition of mineral nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium compounds in plants were founded on their extraction from weight crude vegetative mass of 0.2 M by an acetic acid solution at correlation of plant mass and solution 1:10 with the subsequent definition nitrogen of nitrates and ammonium and phosphorus - in the form of the painted compounds, potassium - on flaming photometer. In comparison to the base variant diagnostic efficiency increased in 4-5 times, energy costs for the preparation of samples for analysis decreased by 5-6 times. From the cycle of studies the use of concentrated sulfuric acid and perhydrol as well as long, injury-hazardous combustion process plant samples was excluded. This technique can be used to control the mineral nutrition of vegetable plants, to assess the quality of productive plants in the selection process, to determine the quality features of power and removal of nutrients by plants.
